email_content:
Dear Alison,

It was great speaking with you recently.

Maintaining the right staffing levels in your call center is an ongoing challenge, especially with the importance of natural English accents to build trust with tenants. That's exactly where our team can help.

If I recall correctly, you may not be directly handling HR operations. If possible, could you kindly connect me with the relevant colleague so we can schedule a follow-up discussion?

üéØ Candidate Selection
We can pre-select qualified professionals with relevant call center experience and arrange interviews for your review. To help you feel confident, we offer a free three-day trial period.

ü§ù Flexible Model
Our service model allows for full-time, part-time, or project-based hiring ‚Äî with backup support from our recruiting team if needed.

üìÖ Next Steps
Would it be convenient to have a short follow-up call next Tuesday or Wednesday around 1:00‚Äì2:00 PM UK time?
We'd be glad to speak further and see how we can cooperate and build a plan that fits your needs.

Looking forward to your reply.
